message.body: do you have an persuasive paper that i could give a speech on
A persuasive paper or you mean a topic idea?
i have to present a speech but it has to be persuasive so i gotta make an outline and stuff. i wanna do something easy
Ok... the effect of media on children (ex: tv influences bad behaviors since most cartoon and shows have violence and video games are violent)
Some ppl day its good bec of educational shows others say its bad (even tom and jerry is violent)... pick your side and argue it
